content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position (-15.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) which is currently working, converting iron ore into iron plates.
- Inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) transferring items from the chest at position (56.5, -83.5).

### Coal Mining and Storage at position (40.0, -84.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (40.0, -84.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden chest at position (40.5, -82.5) storing coal, with a warning to empty it to continue mining.
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -83.5) currently empty.

### Iron Plate Storage and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (56.5, -83.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) waiting to transfer items from the chest.

### Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group with inputs and outputs, facilitating the transport of coal and other materials across the map.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. This will prevent errors related to insufficient inventory when inserting items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
